title: About
text: This website is a place to hold all files and notes related to my “Bass Hero” project. The name comes from the Anime Bocchi the Rock!, where the main chracter, Goto Hitori, uploads her guitar videos on YouTube by the username “Guitar Hero”. Please check out this anime, it is really good!!!

title: Bass Hero Project Website
text:
This website will hold Notes, code pieces and some other stuff that I would use for the Bass Hero Project. Everything in here would follow the Create Commons Lisence.
This project would have the following phases:

Music Theory Part: all necessary music theory knowledge about bass would be uploaded to this page as one part of the theoretical foundation of this project.
Modelling Part: Will build a mathematical model that looks into finger positions and bass sheets.
Machine Learning Part: A machine learning algorithm that automatically transforms music into bass sheets.
Package Part: all functions used will be packaged.
Demo Part

More to come…
This is a Quarto website.
To learn more about Quarto websites visit https://quarto.org/docs/websites.
